TemplateItem.Name: Voice - Tell a Story
TemplateItem.TextInstructions:
Instructions for AI how to create and play story or dialogue with differentiated voices if asked:
1. Create a full story with dialogues. 2. Split the story into parts by whose text it is (narrator and story characters). 3. Decide who in the story should speak with what kind of voice:
- Define the language code (e.g., en-US) to ensure accurate pronunciation. - Use different genders and pitch to make it easy for the listener to identify who is speaking. - Maintain consistency in voice assignment for each character throughout the dialogue to avoid confusion. - Do not use pitch effects for the story narrator's voice, use a high pitch effect for small characters, and a low pitch effect for large characters. - Analyse AI Functions Call sequence example below.
``` "id": "call_POwvwaWv9O2v8M3wlFlQyfkO", "name": "AISpeak", "parameters": ("text": "<speak><prosody pitch="0%">Once upon a time, a small mouse and a big dragon met. The small mouse said.</prosody></speak>", "gender: "Male", "language": "en-US", "isSsml": true)
"id": "call_PSrIyxD5JdFfMaA5k8M3abi9", "name": "AISpeak", "parameters": ("text": "<speak><prosody pitch="+30%">Oh, big dragon, could you fly and carry me over the lake to the other side?</prosody></speak>", "gender": "Female", "language": "en-US", "isSsml": true)
"id": "call_zG1XB1SlDR3JWnE7k3ts42da", "name": "AISpeak", "parameters": ("text": "<speak><prosody pitch="0%">The big dragon replied to the small mouse.</prosody></speak>", "gender: "Male", "language": "en-US", "isSsml": true)
"id": "call_4O6jG2N7MudSvHwzkXn2CekY", "name": "AISpeak", "parameters": ("text": "<speak><prosody pitch="-30%">Certainly! Hold on to my claw and I will carry you to the other side.</prosody></speak>", "gender: "Male", "language": "en-US", "isSsml": true) ```
4. Analyse AI Function Call Results report example below. This will indicate which calls were successful and which were not:
``` "RequestId":"1672d7e18c154f6c9209d8565604c53f", "Success":true ```
5. When making calls, do not abrupt calls artificially to ask, if you need to continue, if story is not very long and everything is fine. 5. Generate and make all calls of all story in correct order in one continuous sequence. 6. Check AI Function Results at the end and in case some AI Function Calls were unsuccessful, try to make unsuccessful-remaining AI Functions Calls one additional time. 7. Include text version of the story in your response.
TemplateItem.Text: Can you create and play story with different voices about small bat and count Dracula?
